sen.j: 祇園会館（ぎおんかいかん）は、 京都府京都市東山区にある映画館。
sen.e: Gion-kaikan Theater is a movie theater located in Higashiyama Ward, Kyoto City, Kyoto Prefecture.
The Gion-kaikan Theater is a movie theater located in Higashiyama Ward, Kyoto City, Kyoto Prefecture.
The Gion-kaikan Theater is a movie theater located in Higashiyama Ward, Kyoto City, Kyoto Prefecture.
The number of seats: 502
The number of seats: 502
The number of seats: 502

sen.j: 二本立て興行、飲食物もちこみ自由、入れ替えなし、途中入退場自由という昭和のレトロなスタイルを保ち続けている日本国内の中でも稀有な名画座である。
sen.e: It is a rare famous-film-showing theater retaining the classic style in the Shora era, where customers can enjoy two films a day for a ticket, enter or exit the theater anytime, and are allowed to bring their food and drink in.

It is a rare famous-film-showing theater retaining the classic style in the Shora era, where customers can enjoy two films a day for a ticket, enter or exit the theater anytime, and are allowed to bring in food and drinks.

It is a rare famous-film-showing theater retaining the classic style in the Showa era, where customers can enjoy two films a day for a ticket, enter or exit the theater anytime, and are allowed to bring in food and drinks.

sen.j: 上映内容は邦画、ハリウッド娯楽ものや韓流映画など過去の人気作品を取り上げており非常に幅が広く、ジャンルにこだわらず興行している。
sen.e: It shows movies in various genres that were popluar in the past, including Japanese movies, entertaiment movies produced in Hollywood and korean movies.
It shows movies in various genres that were popluar in the past, including Japanese movies, entertaiment movies produced in Hollywood and korean movies.
It shows movies in various genres that were popular in the past, including Japanese movies, entertainment movies produced in Hollywood and Korean movies.
sen.cmt: popular、entertainmentスペル訂正しました。Korean大文字にしました。

sen.j: 毎年11月には名物の祇園をどりの開催地となる。
sen.e: In November every year, the famous Gion-odori dance is held here.
In November every year, the famous Gion-odori dance is held here.
In November every year, the famous Gion-odori dance is held here.

sen.j: 外壁には、昭和33年の開館当時から残されているタイル壁画がある。
sen.e: On an external wall, a tile-made wall picture, drawn for its opening in 1958, still remains.
On an external wall, a tile-made wall picture, drawn for its opening in 1958, still remains.
On an external wall, a tile-made wall picture, drawn for its opening in 1958, still remains.

sen.j: 所在地 京都府京都市東山区祇園町北側323 （東大路通り沿い、八坂神社近く）
sen.e: The location is 323 Gionmachikitagawa, Higashiyama Ward, Kyoto City, Kyoto Prefecture (along Higashi-oji Street and near to Yasaka-jinja Shrine).
The location is 323 Gionmachikitagawa, Higashiyama Ward, Kyoto City, Kyoto Prefecture (along Higashi-oji Street and near Yasaka-jinja Shrine).
The location is 323 Gion-machi Kitagawa, Higashiyama Ward, Kyoto City, Kyoto Prefecture (along Higashi-oji Street and near Yasaka-jinja Shrine).
sen.cmt: ハイフン補足、スペース補足、K大文字にしました。

sen.j: 阪急京都線河原町駅下車 徒歩10分
sen.e: The Kyoto Line of Hankyu Railway: Get off at Kawaramachi Station and walk for ten minutes.
The Kyoto Line of Hankyu Railway: Get off at Kawaramachi Station and walk for ten minutes.
The Kyoto Line of Hankyu Railway: Get off at Kawaramachi Station and walk for ten minutes.

sen.j: 京阪本線四条駅下車 徒歩5分
sen.e: Keihan Main Line: Get off at Shijo Station and walk for five minutes.
Keihan Main Line: Get off at Shijo Station and walk for five minutes.
Keihan Main Line: Get off at Shijo Station and walk for five minutes.
